title: Microfinance portfolio rose 26 per cent in FY2023-24: Report
description: The Microfinance sector's portfolio outstanding reached Rs 442.7k crore, rising 26.8% in FY' 2023-24. Personal loans grew the second fastest at 38.3%, with NBFC MFIs dominating the market at 39.2% share.
